thread.title: Rahim Packir Saibo
thread.title_full: Bella Barista - For Coffee Lovers reviewed by Rahim Packir Saibo

author: Rahim Packir Saibo
title: Rahim Packir Saibo
text:
I bought a HX machine from Bella Barista around 8 years ago - the buying experience was excellent; a great selection of the best products available, Claudette was the opposite of pushy, in fact she encouraged me to spend less than I'd intended given my needs.
After-sale support has been second to none, the machine arrived with an in-depth guide written by the team and over the years I've received invaluable advice on repairs and required parts. The team are knowledgeable and go out of their way to help.
